channel.title: XKey Updates
channel.description: XKey - Vietnamese Input Method for macOS

item.title: Version 1.2.18 (Build 20260109.5)
item.description:
What's New

Fix Force AX timing: apply before reading AX values

  • Move ForceAccessibilityManager.applyForCurrentApp() BEFORE detectInjectionMethod()
  • Add 50ms delay after setting AXManualAccessibility to allow AX tree update
  • This ensures Electron/Chromium apps have Force AX enabled before we try to read AX values

Fixes edge case where AX values would be unavailable during injection method detection.

Xem chi tiết trên GitHub
